metadata.title: Instruction donnée par S.A.S. Monseigneur le duc d'Orléans, a ses représentans aux bailliages : suivie de délibérations à prendre dans les assemblées.
metadata.creator: Orléans, Louis Philippe Joseph, duc d', 1747-1793.
Orléans, Louis Philippe Joseph, duc d', 1747-1793
Laclos, Choderlos de, 1741-1803
Limon, Geoffroi, marquis de, d. 1799
Sieyès, Emmanuel Joseph, comte, 1748-1836. Délibérations a prendre pour les assemblées de bailliages
French Revolution Collection (Newberry Library) ICN
metadata.description: Prepared by P. Choderlos de Laclos. Cf. Scott & Rothaus. Attributed to Geoffroi Limon in Martin & Walter
"Délibérations a prendre pour les Assemblées de bailliages" (67 p. at end) attributed to Emmanuel Sieyès in Martin & Walter, III, 21558
Scott & Rothaus. Hist. dict. of French Rev.
Forms part of the French Revolution Collection at the Newberry Library
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Title page and cover are combined. Damaged, stained and/or loose pages. Uneven binding. Skewed text.
